title: Pixel 3 Gestures not working after July 2020 Update
content:
I received the July 2020 Security Update and after restarting the phone, these gestures stopped working,
- Double tap to check phone
- Lift to check phone 
- Flip to shh

Additionally, the magnetometer seem to have stopped working, testing all the above sensors, gyro, accelerometer and proximity sensors are working fine except for the magnetometer, screenshot attached.

I used to have this problem but it was fixed after the February 2020 update, is there any way to fixthis or maybe Downgrade to the previous security update?
